thread.title: Forced inspections for engines used in Southwest explosion

title: Forced inspections for engines used in Southwest explosion
text:
Forced inspections for engines used in Southwest explosion  34 
Regulators in the U.S. and Europe followed a recommendation made on Friday by the manufacturer of the engine involved in a fatal explosion on a Southwest flight this week, which orders airlines to inspect engines immediately.   
Regulators in the U.S. and Europe followed a recommendation made on Friday by the manufacturer of the engine involved in a fatal explosion on a Southwest flight this week, which orders airlines to inspect engines immediately.  //reut.rs/2Hhm2bW
